title: Callum Field
text:
Callum Field (born 7 October 1997) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a forward or for <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Championship">Betfred Championship</a>.
Background.
Field was born in <a href="Pontefract">Pontefract</a>, <a href="West%20Yorkshire%2C%20England">West Yorkshire, England</a>.
Career.
Wigan Warriors.
He has previously played for the <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan Warriors</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> and spent time on loan from <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a> at the <a href="Swinton%20Lions">Swinton Lions</a> and the <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a> in the <a href="RFL%20Championship">Championship</a>, and the <a href="London%20Skolars">London Skolars</a> in <a href="2018%20RFL%20League%201">Betfred League 1</a>.
In 2017 he made his professional début for the <a href="Swinton%20Lions">Swinton Lions</a> against the <a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a>.
Leigh Centurions.
On 5 November 2019 it was announced that Field would join <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a>
Featherstone Rovers.
In December 2020 it was announced that Field had signed for <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> for the 2021 season
